response.overview: Seals & Crofts' 1972 album, "Summer Breeze," is a quintessential soft rock collection. The title track, "Summer Breeze," with its gentle, melodic flow and evocative lyrics, paints a vivid picture of simple joys and the comforting embrace of nature. Jim Seals and Dash Crofts' harmonious vocals glide over an intricate arrangement of acoustic guitar and lush instrumentation, creating a timeless soundscape.  The album, which includes other standout tracks like "Hummingbird" and "East of Ginger Trees," is more than just a collection of songs; it's a nostalgic journey back to moments of peace and tranquility, making it a beloved classic in the annals of 1970s music.  Now available For the first time in nearly 50 years on Blu-ray With 192/24 Resolution Quadraphonic And Hi-Res Stereo Mixes.
response.title: Summer Breeze - Quadio
